tool_description: Generates complete DDL statements for target database schema creation based on source metadata and type mappings.

source_schema_metadata.description: JSON string containing source schema metadata

type_mappings.description: JSON string containing data type mappings

target_database_type.description: Target database type (MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL Server, SQLite)

include_indexes.description: Whether to include index creation statements

include_constraints.description: Whether to include constraint creation statements

naming_convention.description: Naming convention to apply (preserve, lowercase, uppercase, snake_case)

schema_prefix.description: Optional prefix to add to schema object names

add_audit_columns.description: Whether to add audit columns (created_at, updated_at) to tables

create_if_not_exists.description: Whether to use CREATE IF NOT EXISTS syntax

error_messages: Invalid source metadata: Source schema metadata is malformed or incomplete.
Invalid type mappings: Type mapping data is malformed or incomplete.
Unsupported target database: Target database type is not supported.
Invalid naming convention: Specified naming convention is not supported.
DDL generation failed: Unable to generate valid DDL statements for target database.
Constraint conflict: Generated constraints conflict with target database limitations.
usage: Provide source schema metadata, type mappings, and generation options to create complete DDL statements for target database schema creation.

ddl_statements.description: Complete DDL statements for schema creation

table_count.description: Number of tables in generated schema

index_count.description: Number of indexes in generated schema

constraint_count.description: Number of constraints in generated schema

generation_warnings.description: Warnings about potential issues with generated DDL
